text:
Better better go under, better better go under, better better go under, better better go under... a bun, cheeky bun, cheeky bun, chi-bun, a bun cheeky bun cheeky bun, ba ba.

A valuable lesson we all need to contemplate.

text: If anyone could provide the lyrics, it would be much appreciated. I miss this series and its music, I could really go for some new Katamari Damacy adventures right now! I feel like there could be different ways to expand on this series' concept and make it feel fresher than ever, especially since it doesn't really have any competition.

author: BoomBostic _

text: My ideas to expand Katamari:1-Online multiplayer (Co-op and Vs)2-Allow presents to provide boosts in speed, power, growth, jump height etc3-Give each cousins three abilities. That is, one for solo play, one for co-op play, and one for vs playFinally, the game itself...The main game would be a blend between requests from the King, and an RPG adventure where you take the role of the Prince (joined by certain cousins) on a quest to save his sister, the Princess, from an evil threat. In each story level, you would roll your katamari around making it bigger as normal until an enemy encounter stops you. Then, after defeating the assailant, you'd receive a large number of items to grow your katamari more quickly. When you become big enough, you can face the boss enemy, defeat him, and roll him up. There would also be some bonus levels that are handed as requests by both the Robo-King AND the Queen.Sound good?
author: UglySchmuckling

text: +SupraDarky I would kill for another Katamari.  The first two entries were especially well done, and with music like this to complete the experience - WOW just a damned fun game - nothing else like it out there.
